item.title: 越南调查对信贷员数据的网络攻击
item.description: 越南网络安全机构和路透社看到的一份文件显示，越南一个包含债权人数据的大型数据库遭到黑客攻击，目前仍在评估漏洞造成的影响。【原文：A large database in Vietnam containing data on creditors has been attacked by hackers, and the impact of the breach is still being assessed, according to the country's cybersecurity agency as well as a document seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 马来西亚抑制数据中心增长，使中国获得人工智能芯片变得更加复杂
item.description: 作为数据中心的热点地区，马来西亚正在控制扩张步伐，业内人士和分析师预计，此举将阻碍中国获得对提高人工智能能力至关重要的强大芯片的努力。【原文：Malaysia, a hotspot for data centres, is reining in the pace of expansion in a move industry insiders and analysts expect will hinder China's efforts to gain access to powerful chips that are crucial to improving its artificial intelligence capabilities.】

item.title: SK 海力士称完成内部认证后准备生产 HBM4
item.description: 韩国 SK 海力士周五表示，该公司已完成下一代高带宽内存 4（HBM4）芯片的内部认证程序，并建立了面向客户的生产系统。【原文：South Korea's SK Hynix said on Friday it has completed its internal certification process for next generation high-bandwidth memory 4(HBM4) chips and established a production system for customers.】

item.title: 亚洲市场乘美联储宽松周期东风再创新高
item.description: 周五，亚洲股市跟随华尔街走高，原因是美国再次降息的前景日益明朗，有望降低全球借贷成本，从而缓解债券市场的压力并拖累美元。【原文：Asian share markets followed Wall Street higher on Friday as the growing prospect of several more U.S. rate cuts promised to lower borrowing costs globally, a relief to stressed bond markets and a drag on the dollar.】

item.title: 申请失业救济人数支撑美联储降息观点，美元受挫
item.description: 周五，美元继续承压，原因是美国申请失业救济人数激增和通胀率小幅上扬，使投资者对美联储下周及以后可能的降息保持高度关注。【原文：The dollar remained under pressure on Friday as a surge in U.S. jobless claims and a modest tick up in inflation kept investors zeroed in on likely Federal Reserve interest rate cuts next week and beyond.】

item.title: 供应过剩和美国需求担忧导致油价跌幅扩大
item.description: 油价在上一交易日大跌后周五走低，原因是市场担心美国需求可能走软，以及广泛的供应过剩抵消了对中东冲突和乌克兰战争导致供应中断的担忧。【原文：Oil prices edged lower on Friday after big falls in the last session over concerns about possible softening of U.S. demand and broad oversupply that offset worry about supply disruption from conflict in the Middle East and war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 美日重申外汇承诺，为干预留有余地
item.description: 根据周五发表的一份联合声明，美国和日本重申了对 "市场决定 "汇率的承诺，同时同意外汇干预应仅限于应对过度波动。【原文：The United States and Japan reaffirmed their commitment to "market determined" exchange rates, while agreeing that foreign exchange interventions should be reserved for combating excess volatility, according to a joint statement released on Friday.】

item.title: 连锁咖啡馆黑岩咖啡吧在美国首次公开募股中融资 2.94 亿美元
item.description: 黑石咖啡吧周四表示，该咖啡连锁店已在美国首次公开募股中募集到 2.941 亿美元，为关税动荡后备受关注的消费者上市奠定了基础。【原文：Black Rock Coffee Bar has raised $294.1 million in its U.S. initial public offering, the cafe chain said on Thursday, setting the stage for a closely-watched consumer listing in the aftermath of the tariff turmoil.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，OpenAI、Nvidia 将宣布对英国数据中心的投资
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引知情人士的话报道，OpenAI 和英伟达计划在下周与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普同时前往英国时，承诺支持数十亿美元的英国数据中心投资。【原文：OpenAI and Nvidia plan to pledge support for billions of dollars in UK data center investments when they head to the country next week at the same time as U.S. President Donald Trump, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 独家报道贝森特与中国副总理将于下周在马德里就贸易和 TikTok 举行会谈
item.description: 美国财政部周四表示，美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）计划下周在马德里与中国国务院副总理何立峰及其他高级官员继续就贸易、经济和国家安全问题进行讨论。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent plans to with Chinese Vice Premier He Lifeng and other senior officials next week in Madrid to continue their discussions on trade, economic and national security issues, the Treasury said on Thursday.】

item.title: Blackstone 支持的 Legence 在美国首次公开募股中融资 7.28 亿美元
item.description: 工程与维护服务供应商 Legence 周四在美国首次公开募股中募集到 7.28 亿美元，在投资者热情高涨的背景下，该公司成为众多寻求上市的公司中的一员。【原文：Engineering and maintenance services provider Legence raised $728 million in its U.S. initial public offering on Thursday, adding its name to the string of companies looking to go public amid heightened investor enthusiasm.】

item.title: 研究公司称，8 月份全球电动汽车销量增速放缓至 15
item.description: 市场研究公司 Rho Motion 周五表示，8 月份全球全电动汽车和插电式混合动力汽车销量同比增长 15%，创下自 1 月份以来的最慢增速，反映出比较更加严峻的形势。【原文：Global sales of fully electric and plug-in hybrid vehicles grew 15% in August from a year ago, marking the slowest rate since January and reflecting tougher comparatives, market research firm Rho Motion said on Friday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，加密货币交易所双子星在美国首次公开募股（IPO）中融资 4.25 亿美元
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引一位熟知内情的人士的话报道，双子座空间站公司在首次公开募股中筹集了 4.25 亿美元，股票定价高于市场范围，股票数量也有所减少。【原文：Gemini Space Station raised $425 million in an initial public offering, pricing its stock above a marketed range and shrinking the number of shares, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国指控被解雇的 Two Sigma Quant 研究员犯有欺诈罪
item.description: 美国当局周四表示，Two Sigma Investments 公司的一名前定量研究员因涉嫌欺诈而被起诉，他涉嫌操纵该大型对冲基金的算法模型，在给客户造成 1.65 亿美元损失的同时，也为自己带来了 2350 万美元的酬劳。【原文：A former quantitative researcher at Two Sigma Investments has been indicted for fraud, after allegedly manipulating the large hedge fund's algorithmic models to generate a $23.5 million payday for himself while causing $165 million of harm to clients, U.S. authorities said on Thursday.】

item.title: 捷蓝航空看好大西洋战略，希望建立更多门户连接
item.description: 捷蓝航空公司（JetBlue Airways）周四表示，该公司看好其跨大西洋战略，并希望尽快将更多乘客连接到大西洋门户。【原文：JetBlue Airways said on Thursday it is bullish on its transatlantic strategy and is looking to connect more passengers with Atlantic gateways as quickly as possible.】

item.title: 微软与 OpenAI 达成非约束性协议，允许 OpenAI 重组
item.description: 微软和 OpenAI 周四表示，他们已就双方关系的新条款签署了一份不具约束力的协议，这将使 OpenAI 能够推进其重组为一家营利性公司的计划。【原文：Microsoft and OpenAI said on Thursday they have signed a non-binding deal for new terms of their relationship that would allow OpenAI to move forward with its plan to restructure itself into a for-profit company.】

item.title: 交易日轻松搞定，华尔街再攀高峰
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 波音公司首席执行官表示，波音在 777X 的认证方面落后了
item.description: 波音公司首席执行官凯利-奥特伯格（Kelly Ortberg）周四表示，波音公司最新宽体飞机 777-9 的认证工作落后于计划。【原文：Boeing CEO Kelly Ortberg said on Thursday that the planemaker is behind schedule on certifying the 777-9, its newest widebody jet.】

item.title: 设计软件需求强劲，Adobe 上调年度收入和利润预期
item.description: Adobe 周四上调了 2025 财年的收入和利润预期，表明其设计软件需求强劲，人工智能工具的货币化程度也有所提高。【原文：Adobe raised its fiscal 2025 revenue and profit forecasts on Thursday, signaling strong demand for its design software and increased monetization of its artificial intelligence tools.】

item.title: 新西兰房价前景黯淡，经济疲软和失业削弱了新西兰央行的宽松政策
item.description: 路透社（Reuters）对房地产分析师进行的一项民意调查显示，尽管新西兰采取了积极的宽松货币政策，但由于脆弱的经济影响了购房者的信心，到2027年，新西兰房价的上涨速度将低于此前的预期。【原文：New Zealand home prices will rise slower than previously expected through 2027 as a fragile economy weighs on buyer confidence despite aggressive monetary policy easing, a Reuters poll of property analysts showed.】

item.title: 化学品制造商陶氏认为九月份聚乙烯价格走势良好
item.description: 陶氏首席执行官吉姆-菲特林（Jim Fitterling）周四表示，聚乙烯市场在第二季度因关税不确定性而下滑后，9月份的价格走势将趋于乐观。【原文：Dow CEO Jim Fitterling said on Thursday the polyethylene market is setting up for positive price action in September following a dip in the second quarter due to tariff uncertainties.】

item.title: 特朗普政府采取行动取消阻止解除美联储理事库克职务的裁决
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的政府周四请求联邦上诉法院允许特朗普暂时解除美联储理事丽莎-库克的职务，因为一名法官称他可能缺乏这样做的理由。【原文：President Donald Trump's administration on Thursday asked a federal appeals court to allow Trump to remove Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook from office for now after a judge said he likely lacked cause to do so.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司首席执行官表示，预计到 2028 年每年交付 100 架商用喷气机
item.description: 巴西航空工业公司首席执行官告诉路透社记者，该公司预计在2028年达到每年交付100架商用飞机的目标。【原文：Embraer expects to reach 100 commercial aircraft deliveries per year in 2028, its CEO told Reuters, adding that supply chain issues will likely keep the Brazilian planemaker from hitting that mark sooner.】

item.title: 美国能源部长淡化气候风险，华盛顿寻求欧盟天然气协议
item.description: 美国能源部长克里斯-赖特（Chris Wright）周四在推动华盛顿回归 "常识性能源政策 "时淡化了气候变化的风险，与此同时，特朗普政府努力促进向欧洲和其他盟国出售石油和天然气。【原文：U.S. Energy Secretary Chris Wright downplayed the risks of climate change as he promoted Washington's return to a "commonsense energy policy" on Thursday, while the Trump administration worked to boost oil and gas sales to Europe and other allies.】

item.title: 甲骨文大涨显示人工智能行业对市场的影响力与日俱增
item.description: 华尔街的 "人工智能交易 "推动市场在今年创下历史新高，而甲骨文惊人的股价涨幅又给了投资者一个支持这一交易的理由。【原文：Wall Street's "AI trade" has propelled the market to record highs this year, and Oracle's stunning share-price gains are giving investors another reason to back the trade.】

item.title: 美国起诉优步，指控其残疾歧视
item.description: 美国政府周四起诉优步科技公司（Uber Technologies），指控这家共享出行公司歧视残疾乘客。【原文：The U.S. government on Thursday sued Uber Technologies , accusing the ride-sharing company of discriminating against passengers with disabilities.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，派拉蒙 Skydance 准备竞购埃利森支持的华纳兄弟 Discovery 公司
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四报道，派拉蒙 Skydance 公司正准备以现金多数出价收购华纳兄弟 Discovery 公司，该公司得到了埃里森家族的支持。【原文：Paramount Skydance is preparing a majority cash bid for Warner Bros Discovery that is backed by the Ellison family, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 礼来公司就 1.837 亿美元医疗补助欺诈赔偿金提出的上诉败诉
item.description: 联邦上诉法院周四驳回了礼来公司对一名举报律师和药剂师赢得的 1.837 亿美元判决的上诉，该律师和药剂师指控该制药商欺诈医疗补助计划。【原文：A federal appeals court on Thursday rejected Eli Lilly's appeal of an $183.7 million judgment won by a whistleblowing lawyer and pharmacist who accused the drugmaker of defrauding Medicaid.】

item.title: 西南航空转变战略，探索远程航班服务
item.description: 美国西南航空公司首席执行官鲍勃-乔丹（Bob Jordan）周四表示，作为扭亏为盈战略的一部分，公司正在研究长途国际航班和高级机场贵宾室。【原文：Southwest Airlines CEO Bob Jordan said on Thursday the company is looking at long-haul international flights and premium airport lounges as part of its turnaround strategy.】

item.title: 迪尔公司高管称全球贸易紧张局势可能导致巴西销售额下降
item.description: 全球农业机械制造商迪尔公司（Deere & Co.）的一位高管周四表示，由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税和南美国家的高利率所带来的全球不确定性，2026年迪尔公司在巴西的销售额可能会下降一位数。【原文：Global agricultural machinery manufacturer Deere & Co.'s sales in Brazil could fall by a single-digit percentage in 2026 amid global uncertainties related to U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs and high interest rates in the South American country, an executive said on Thursday.】
